entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
